@AnimeAmerica We understand your sentiments and we're truly sorry to hear about your experience. May we know if you were able to approach any of our airport staff for further assistance?
@mountmayonph Hi, mountmayonph! As of the moment, our website is under maintenance. We suggest to check back at a later time for updates :) Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@Trixen01 Should you have any concern, you may reach out to any PAL representative at the airport or through us via DM. We’ll relay it to our Airport team. Thank you.

(2/2)

@Trixen01 We were able to reach our Airport team, and they are working on securing your accommodations, Trixen. Our Airport Team is working with PH Immigration to allow your entry to the Philippines so you can be checked in in a hotel. We’re so sorry for the inconvenience.

(1/n)

@rhineandshines @queer___femme Hi, Rhine. We regret to learn of your refund concern. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your concern? Thank you.

@AnimeAmerica Should you have any concern, you may reach out to any PAL representative at the airport or through us via DM. We’ll relay it to our Airport team. Thank you.

(2/2)

@AnimeAmerica We were able to reach our Airport team, and they are working on securing your accommodations, AnimeAmerica. Our Airport Team is working with PH Immigration to allow your entry to the Philippines so you can be checked in in a hotel. We’re so sorry for the inconvenience.

(1/n)

@JoePro42625112 @hans_porter Hi, Joe. We regret to learn of this. We assure you that we are reaching out to the passengers to assist them with their concerns. We hope that you will continue flying with us. Thank you.
@watanabeshien You're welcome, Bonk. :)
@watanabeshien Hi, Bonk. You may bring packed snacks for personal consumption. However, final assessment will still be subject to our airport personnel. Thank you.

urls.title: Medication and Medical Oxygen
urls.description: Medical oxygen will only be provided by Philippine Airlines. Passengers will not be allowed to expend oxygen on board using their own oxygen bottles for safety reasons and in compliance with pertinent regulations. However, for the purpose of availing oneself of oxygen immediately prior to embarkation and after disembarkation, the carriage of an oxygen bottle/cylinder under five (05) kilograms may be allowed provided this is packed properly and is strictly not to be used on board. PAL shall require: 72

data.text:
@Zen_Mejias Passengers may bring and use their portable oxygen concentrator (POC), continuous positive airways pressure (CPAP) machines, ventilators or respirators on board provided that they comply with certain conditions. Please refer to this link: 
https://t.co/GfkYTkM48t. Thank you.
@Tankless_Tester Oops, we've tried sending you a dm but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check.
@Tankless_Tester Hi, Tankless_tester. We're truly sorry to hear this. We'll send you a dm to ask for your details.
@Zen_Mejias Hi, Zeny. May we know your flight route?
@KemuelMariano @PALMabuhayMiles We are sorry to hear this, Kemuel. May you provide more details on your concern? We will do our best to help.
@linettetagle Hi, Mary. We have replied to your DM.

data.text: @schoolgirl Hi, (ja)ck⁷ in the box 🃏🐳💜. As of the moment, your flight remains confirmed and has no changes. You may check our website, https://t.co/ePCV247Zu7, for flight status updates. Thank you!
@kikz2018 Hello, Kris John. We are utilizing Airbus A321 for our Manila to Davao flights. Thank you.
@PatPSquare Thank you, Pat! We have sent you a DM.

@PatPSquare Hi, Pat. We're sorry to hear about your unfavorable experience. We're trying to send you a DM but we're unable to due to your profile settings. May we request to change it so we may initiate a conversation with you and assist you further regarding your raised concern. Thank you!
@ianrustia Good morning, Official Iarus. We have forwarded your feedback to the concerned office. May we confirm which Mobile App are you using and what version? Thank you.

@jethe3rd Hi, Al. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the flight delay. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your concern? Thank you.
@teachermajik We have sent you a DM, Teacher. Thank you.

@teachermajik Hi, Teacher. We regret to learn of your refund concern. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your concern? Thank you.
@yammiemsa You're welcome!

@yammiemsa For flights following the weight system, such as domestic flights, the passenger may bring two or more bags for check-in as long as she will not exceed her total check-in baggage allowance. No need to select the quantity. 😊
@yammiemsa You're welcome! Previously purchased Prepaid Baggage may be upgraded up to a maximum of 40kgs per person per sector, except on routes with restrictions such as Basco and Busuanga. 😊

urls.title: Prepaid baggage
urls.description: No need to worry about your travel essentials! Save more versus excess fees at the airport. Check-in smoothly at the airport. Rates are per sector and vary per destination. Please refer to the rates and guidelines below. PH – Hong Kong or v.v. USD 45 PH – Port Moresby or v.v. USD 65 PH – Sydney/Melbourne or v.v. USD 95 PH – Tel Aviv or v.v. USD 165 PH – Singapore or v.v. USD 45 PH – Phnom Penh or v.v. USD 45 PH – Hong Kong or v.v. HKD 380 PH – Shanghai or v.v. CNY 320 PH – Denpasar or v.v. IDR 630000 PH

urls.title: Choice Seats
urls.description: Get ready for a relaxing flight when you secure your preferred seats in advance. With Choice Seats Extra Legroom, get more personal space and room to stretch out. With Choice Seats Forward, be one of the first to disembark. These seats are located at the exit rows or bulkhead/cabin divider and allow passengers more space to stretch and rest their legs. These seats are in the front rows of the Economy cabin, except for seats at the exit rows or bulk heads. Passengers in Forward seats disembark the fastest

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @MsCLDelCastillo Filipino and foreign nationals aged 18 and above who have received primary series of COVID-19 vaccine, and at least one (1) COVID-19 booster shot are no longer required to present a pre-departure negative COVID-19 test. Thank you.

urls.title: Arriving in Philippines
urls.description: International passengers must follow the arrival procedures of their PH port of entry mandated by PAL and the Philippine Government. Unvaccinated, partially vaccinated, and passengers whose vaccination status cannot be verified shall be required to complete a facility-based quarantine at the first port of entry into the Philippines, regardless the onward domestic destination. Ensure to check your first PH arrival airport prior to booking the facility. Last updated: PH Local Time, June 15, 2022 Travel

data.text: @francethel Hi, Ethel. We're sorry to hear this. May we confirm if your used card is enrolled to the 3D Secure service?
@COMINATCHA_18 Hi, Medium. We're sorry to hear your disappointment. However, please note that for voluntary refund requests, it will depend on your fare rules and ticket restrictions.
@kiarracoco Sent, Kiarra.
@kiarracoco Kindly try following us so we can try to send you a dm, Kiarra.
@kiarracoco Oops, we've tried sending you a dm, Kiarra. However, your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check.
@kiarracoco Hi, Kiarra. We're truly sorry to hear this. We certainly have no intention to cause you any disservice. We'll send you a dm so we can look into this.
@Got_To_Think Hi, Angge. Please allow us to look into this. We have sent you a DM to further assist you. Kindly check. Thank you.
